You‚Äôre welcome to RSVP on Jamf Nation, but we need an attendee list from Eventbrite to give to security to help speed up check-in prior to the event. Please bring a valid form of ID for check-in with security.

Venue Information

  • The Austin Technology Center North (ATN) is located on the corner of Parmer and McCallen Pass in the Tech Ridge area. You‚Äôll see a sign off the road with an entrance to the open parking lot.
  • Parking is free and the lot will be largely unoccupied in the evening. Enter through the main entrance off of McCallen Pass.
  • Check in with security when you arrive and they‚Äôll alert our hosts to your arrival. It‚Äôs important that you RSVP on Eventbrite prior to the meetup to streamline the check-in process. Make sure you bring a valid form of government ID.
  • DM @emily on the MacAdmins slack or email emily@austinappleadmins.org if you have any questions.

Upcoming meetups
